titleStmt.title: The saints communion with God, and Gods communion with them in ordinances. As it was delivered in severall sermons / by that faithfull servant of Christ, Mr. William Strong, late minister at Westminster.
titleStmt.author: Strong, William, d. 1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for George Sawbridge at the Bible on Ludgate-hill, and Ro: Gibbs in Chancery Lane.,
